aircraft.value: Vulture Heavy - AC-8765-602 at Zone-4 Facility

defect_observed.value: Cabin pressurization rate anomaly. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Pneumatic Starter component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

preventive_action.value: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 10/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 12/01/2025 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 11/01/2025 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 15/01/2025 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 16/01/2025 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair
